title: Pre-existing merge conflicts and test errors block typecheck
issue: Branch has merge conflicts in apps/server/src/features/signaling/socket-handlers.ts and socket-handlers.test.ts (lines 641-667), test syntax errors in apps/widget/src/features/webrtc/useWebRTC.test.ts (line 1067), and template literal errors in apps/server/src/lib/organization.test.ts (lines 67, 412). These errors prevent the full monorepo typecheck from passing. These are NOT related to TKT-103 changes (auto-resume functionality).
suggestion: Resolve merge conflicts in socket-handlers.ts and socket-handlers.test.ts. Fix test syntax errors in useWebRTC.test.ts and organization.test.ts. Run full typecheck after fixing to verify.
